channel.title: Posts on Scott C. Wilson
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Scott C. Wilson

item.title: My business website
item.description: This is my business website. I’ve been doing Zen Cart modifications (and also working with a handful of other carts) since 2006.

item.title: My store
item.description: This is the store where I sell my mods (mostly Zen Cart). Naturally the store runs Zen Cart!

item.title: My book group website
item.description: This is my book group website. We have been reading together for more than ten years.

item.title: My blog
item.description: This is my blog. It’s mostly about my Zen Cart work but sometimes I cover a few other topics so it’s less of a snooze-fest.
